text: Har kuco ʙosed, marg sumoro darmejoʙad, harcand dar ʙurchoi ustuvor ʙosed. Va agar ʙa onon [munofiqon] xajre [hamcun farzand va moli farovon] ʙirasad, megujand: "In az coniʙi Alloh taolo ast" va agar sarre [hamcun margu zijoni moli] ʙa eson ʙirasad, [rasuli Allohro ʙadnom medonand va ʙa u] megujand: "In az coniʙi tust". [Ej pajomʙar, ʙa onon] Bigu: "Hama [ciz] az coniʙi Alloh taolo ast". Caro in qavm hozir nestand, ki suxanero dark kunand
